title: Gemma Collins hasn't stopped eating since calling 999 on James Argent
text:
Gemma has been too stressed for the gym (Picture: REX/Mega)

Gemma Collins confessed she has been eating none stop ever since calling the police over concerns that James Argent ‘overdosed’.

The 38-year-old has been on a mission to lose weight for over a year but the ‘stress’ she felt from has made her unwell as well as made her overeat.

Speaking to The Sun, Gemma said: ‘I ain’t stopped eating. I’ve had a lot of stress and I’ve not been to the gym in two weeks, I’ve been unwell all weekend with a chest infection.

‘When I come back, I will get back on it, I always come out on top. My life always goes a bit t*ts-up I carry on, I’ve got lots of projects on the table, so it’s exciting.’

Gemma had reportedly called the police on 17 October when Arg failed to answer messages from his friends.

Advertisement

Advertisement

According to the Sun on Sunday, it prompted Gemma to contact the emergency services who then visited the reality star’s home in South Woodford, north London to check he was well.

Explaining the situation, Arg told the publication: ‘I wasn’t speaking to a certain person so I didn’t reply.

Gemma’s been showing off her amazing weight loss (Picture: Ana M. Wiggins / BACKGRID)

‘They became concerned and called the police and ambulance. They turned up and checked on me. They came up to my room to make sure I was fine.’

Arg, 31, says his parents were already in the house checking up on him when ‘this person’ called the emergency services again.

An ambulance then turned up to his house at around 4pm and they had a ‘quick chat on the doorstep’ with Arg, who has just moved into the property.

‘I wasn’t speaking to this person for a reason and they were worried about my safety because I wasn’t answering the phone,’ the TV star explained.

Welp, that’s one way to deal with getting left on read.

A few days later, Arg had also been reportedly banned from EasyJet for two years after running onto the runway while on holiday with on-again off-again beau Gemma.

James felt embarrassed about the 999 call (Picture: Ian Lawrence/GC Images)

The incident, which happened in Italy earlier this year, saw the police get involved after the Towie star tried to access the runway through a fire door.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It came after Arg arrived late to the airport and was told he wouldn’t be able to board.

One source told The Sun that the dramatic moment signalled ‘the beginning of the end’ for the reality TV star couple.

Maybe he was just taking a walk.

description: Gemma Collins confessed she has been non-stop stress-eating since she called 999 over fears James Argent had 'overdosed' last week.
